Other minerals

Knowledge and knowhow

MincoTech has been supplying and servicing mines, with exceptional Australian-designed and made mineral processing equipment for more than 40 years. We bring quality and excellence to any project, whether that be coal and iron ore to gold, lithium and other minerals.

Our experience in delivering timely solutions, higher yield products and excellence in customer service, is what sets us apart from our competitors.

Other mineralsâ€™ products

We pride ourselves on extracting the highest yield mineral for our clients and to do this, we have sourced the best range of products and expert solutions.

Talk to us about your next project. We are all about collaboration.

Pipes

Built to the utmost quality to withstand some harsh, rocky treatment. MincoTech pipes range in size, thickness, weight and material. Our team can guide you on the best product for the job.

Mincowrap Pipe Repair Bandage

Pipe Couplings

Cast Basalt Pipes

Cyclones

Minco Tech cyclones are modelled with consideration given to extensive and successful research carried out over the last 40 years. This R&D is also supported by results from hundreds of installations throughout the world. These cyclones are achieving maximum yields and efficiency in sizes from 50mm to 1500mm and feed rates of 10 tonnes per hour to 1000 tonnes per hour.

Minco Tech offer individually designed cyclones to ensure maximum performance for each application. Minco Tech Cyclones are available in various materials from 27% chrome to pre-engineered high alumina ceramic tiles. Wall thickness from 25mm to 38mm. For expert assistance contact Minco Tech sales and service engineers

Hydrocyclones

Dewatering

Our dewatering experts provide total solutions, drawing on extensive engineering and application expertise. We work with mine operators to understand the specific dewatering requirements of any mine site: open-pit or underground.

Sprays

Water Filter

Sieve Bends

Phoenix Filter Presses

Magnetics

Our magnetic separators are of superior design to efficiently recover magnetic material and are available in several types.

Depending on your requirement, MincoTech supplies and services both permanent or suspended wet and dry magnetic separators.

Suspended Electro and Permanent Magnets
